Committee Assignments Rules Officials Certified Rules Officials Rules Training and Certification USGA Rules Certification Test Rules of Golf Archived Stories Fall Volunteer Appreciation Days Course Raters Board of Directors Volunteers of the Year Volunteer Policies SEMINARS Introduction to Volunteering Fall Volunteer Appreciation Days USGA Rules Certification Test Rules of Golf Workshops Rules & Officiating Workshops Rules of Golf Resources World Handicap System™ FOUNDATION Give a Gift Now Planned Giving Future of Golf Foundation College Scholarships Barry Masters Golf Foundation Player Grants Executives & Board Team Florida Past Presidents Hall of Fame Annual Awards One-Day Events MORE + Home Tee Times & Info Full Results Course Info Buckhorn Springs G & CC Buckhorn Springs Golf & Country Club, Valrico, FL February 13, 2025 Tournament Results Under 50 Division 50-59 Division 60-69 Division 70 & Over Division Women's Division Pos Position Name Rd.1 Total Total Score Points 1 Shawn Cremeans 72 72 45 2 Matthew Smith 77 77 20 3 Jack Kasting 78 78 0 4 Andy Weber 79 79 0 5 Ryan Matiyak 79 79 0 Pos Position Name Rd.1 Total Total Score Points 1 Anthony Walker 70 70 50 2 Matt Ruthven 74 74 35 3 Michael Roberts 76 76 15 4 Eric Hutchison 76 76 0 5 Willie McClinton 78 78 0 Pos Position Name Rd.1 Total Total Score Points 1 Donald N Scott 68 68 65 2 Richard Bosler 70 70 50 3 Ronald Martinez 74 74 40 4 Jim Barker 75 75 30 5 Steven Durant 75 75 25 Pos Position Name Rd.1 Total Total Score Points 1 Brent Mercke 70 70 65 2 John Christensen 71 71 50 3 Anthony Escobio 72 72 40 4 David Norka 72 72 30 5 Mark Pace 73 73 20 Pos Position Name Rd.1 Total Total Score Points 1 Theresa Rainwater 75 75 50 2 Marybeth Mason 77 77 0 3 Kay Roush 85 85 0 4 Margaret Hyatt 86 86 0 5 Karen Weber 87 87 0 + View Full Results Tournament Results Hole by Hole Results Starting Time & Entry Fee 8:30 AM shotgun $65 - Includes: Cart, golf, range balls and prizes ($10 per person, from the entry fee, is in the gift certificate pot) Any late entrant that gains acceptance into the field will be subject to a $10 late entry fee Pairings Request - "Email onedays@fsga.org" Players can request their own groupings Send an email request for pairings to onedays@fsga.org All pairings requests must be received at least 5 days prior to the event to guarantee your pairing In the email, please specify the event and the players with whom you wish to play All other groupings are made randomly within flights Age Divisions & Approximate Yardages **All players must compete in the age division commensurate with their age as of the event day. No players are allowed to play out of their age division ** Men's Under 50 Age Division - 6,300 - 6,500 yards (Gross & Net) Men's 50-59 Age Division - 6,000 yards - 6,200 yards (Gross & Net) Men's 60-69 Age Division - 5,600 - 5,800 yards (Gross & Net) Men's 70 & Over Age Division - 5,600 - 5,800 yards (Gross & Net) Women's Division - 4,900 yards - 5,100 yards (Gross & Net) Men's Format 18 holes of net and gross stroke play within flights Each player will use their playing handicap for the day (95%) Handicap Indexes will be taken from the close of entry date Payout will be NET, then Gross. Payouts will vary based on division size. Points will be awarded based on Net scores only. Maximum score of 10 per hole is in effect Local Rule: E-5 Alternative to Stroke & Distance for Lost Ball or Ball Out of Bounds is in effect Women's Format 18 holes of net and gross stroke play Each player will use their playing handicap for the day (95%) Handicap Indexes will be taken from the close of entry date Payout will be NET, then Gross. Payouts will vary based on division size. Points will be awarded based on Net scores only. Maximum score of 10 per hole is in effect Local Rule: E-5 Alternative to Stroke & Distance for Lost Ball or Ball Out of Bounds is in effect Eligibility Male and Female amateur golfers at least 18 years of age or older - See the FSGA’s Competitive Fairness Gender Policy FSGA/GHIN handicap required for ALL players (24.0 or less for men and 34.0 or less for women) Golfers who do not have a FSGA/GHIN handicap index from a FSGA member club may purchase a handicap online at fsga.org . Live Scoring Requirements For all One-Day events, live scoring will be required through the Golf Genius mobile app. Only one person per group will need to type in the gross scores for each player, and more communication will be sent to the field a few days prior to the event. For convenience purposes, please download the Golf Genius mobile app before arriving to the course.
